name: poltergeist
description: A bot written in Bun/DiscordJS/TypeScript for GhostLands's Discord (and (indirectly) Minecraft) server.

scripts.prisma: bun x prisma generate; bun x prisma migrate dev

author: Team GhostLand; original version (Siedemnaskobot - a DC bot for 17LO Gdynia's Discord) developed by SimonB50, with an „assist” (-10x dev kind - but I swear, I improved ince then) by Guzio.
